tool.name: SAGA.statistics_kriging.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOINTS False isArrayFIELD False isArrayTARGET_TEMPLATE False output_data_PREDICTION $output_data_PREDICTION output_data_VARIANCE $output_data_VARIANCE output_data_CV_SUMMARY $output_data_CV_SUMMARY output_data_CV_RESIDUALS $output_data_CV_RESIDUALS name SAGA.statistics_kriging.0 POINTS $POINTS FIELD $FIELD TARGET_DEFINITION $TARGET_DEFINITION TARGET_USER_SIZE $TARGET_USER_SIZE TARGET_USER_XMIN $TARGET_USER_XMIN TARGET_USER_XMAX $TARGET_USER_XMAX TARGET_USER_YMIN $TARGET_USER_YMIN TARGET_USER_YMAX $TARGET_USER_YMAX TARGET_USER_COLS $TARGET_USER_COLS TARGET_USER_ROWS $TARGET_USER_ROWS TARGET_USER_FITS $TARGET_USER_FITS TARGET_TEMPLATE $TARGET_TEMPLATE VAR_MAXDIST $VAR_MAXDIST VAR_NCLASSES $VAR_NCLASSES VAR_NSKIP $VAR_NSKIP VAR_MODEL '$VAR_MODEL' TQUALITY $TQUALITY LOG $LOG BLOCK $BLOCK DBLOCK $DBLOCK CV_METHOD $CV_METHOD CV_SAMPLES $CV_SAMPLES SEARCH_RANGE $SEARCH_RANGE SEARCH_RADIUS $SEARCH_RADIUS SEARCH_POINTS_ALL $SEARCH_POINTS_ALL SEARCH_POINTS_MIN $SEARCH_POINTS_MIN SEARCH_POINTS_MAX $SEARCH_POINTS_MAX SEARCH_DIRECTION $SEARCH_DIRECTION prefer $prefer response $response outputType_PREDICTION $OutputSection_PREDICTION.outputType_PREDICTION transmissionMode_PREDICTION $OutputSection_PREDICTION.transmissionMode_PREDICTION outputType_VARIANCE $OutputSection_VARIANCE.outputType_VARIANCE transmissionMode_VARIANCE $OutputSection_VARIANCE.transmissionMode_VARIANCE outputType_CV_SUMMARY $OutputSection_CV_SUMMARY.outputType_CV_SUMMARY transmissionMode_CV_SUMMARY $OutputSection_CV_SUMMARY.transmissionMode_CV_SUMMARY outputType_CV_RESIDUALS $OutputSection_CV_RESIDUALS.outputType_CV_RESIDUALS transmissionMode_CV_RESIDUALS $OutputSection_CV_RESIDUALS.transmissionMode_CV_RESIDUALS

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Attribute
param.help: Attribute The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TARGET_USER_COLS
param.label: Columns
param.help: Number of cells in East-West direction.

param.name: TARGET_USER_ROWS
param.label: Rows
param.help: Number of cells in North-South direction.

param.name: TARGET_TEMPLATE
param.label: Target System
param.help: use this grid's system for output grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff

param.name: VAR_MAXDIST
param.label: Maximum Distance
param.help: maximum distance for variogram estimation, ignored if set to zero

param.name: VAR_NCLASSES
param.label: Lag Distance Classes
param.help: initial number of lag distance classes

param.name: CV_SAMPLES
param.label: Cross Validation Subsamples
param.help: number of subsamples for k-fold cross validation

param.name: SEARCH_RADIUS
param.label: Maximum Search Distance
param.help: local maximum search distance given in map units

param.name: SEARCH_POINTS_MIN
param.label: Minimum
param.help: minimum number of points to use

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_PREDICTION
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_VARIANCE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_CV_SUMMARY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_CV_RESIDUALS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: Ordinary Kriging for grid interpolation from irregular sample points.
